entries.question: What is one of the most important of these spiritual gifts?
How does the Lord speak through the prophets?
Will the gift of prophecy be found in God's remnant church?
entries.authorNote: The 'testimony of Jesus' is 'the Spirit of Prophecy' (Revelation 19:10). The Spirit of Prophecy has been one of the chief ways by which God communicated with His people in times past. It should not be considered a new thing if He chooses to use this method in the last days.
